casebody.data:
ACRO SERVICE CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF PURCHASE AND PROPERTY AND 22ND CENTURY TECHNOLOGIES, INC., Defendants-Respondents. C-252 September Term 2018
081310 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 2, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003 810-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
